configuration.name: An editor should be able to create new articles that become visible under the relevant product section on the helpcentre

configuration.name: When an editor has created an article and associated it to a product it should appear on the product page

CUCUMBER_RUN_CONFIG_SETTINGS_ID.NAME: TEST_NAME_FILTER
CUCUMBER_RUN_CONFIG_SETTINGS_ID.VALUE: When\ an\ editor\ has\ created\ an\ article\ and\ associated\ it\ to\ a\ product\ it\ should\ appear\ on\ the\ product\ page

configuration.name: When more than one article is associated with a product the product should only appear once on the home page

CUCUMBER_RUN_CONFIG_SETTINGS_ID.NAME: TEST_NAME_FILTER
CUCUMBER_RUN_CONFIG_SETTINGS_ID.VALUE: When\ more\ than\ one\ article\ is\ associated\ with\ a\ product\ the\ product\ should\ only\ appear\ once\ on\ the\ home\ page

configuration.name: Articles should be able to viewed individually
